mapper.select: select mId AS id, mPassword AS password, mName AS name, mBalance AS balance from member_tb where mId = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into member_tb(mId, mPassword, mName, mBalance) values(#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{balance})
mapper.update: update member_tb set mPassword = #{password}, mName = #{name}, mBalance = #{balance} where mId = #{id}
